item.description:
This film won best of fest at both the Toronto and Palm Springs Film Festivals.  I highly recommend it to you.

Ulrik is a somewhat gentle man, which is hard to be when working for a gangster. In this dark comedy, we follow Ulrik after he is released from prison and tries to lead a somewhat gentle life. 2010. Norway. 103 min. Not Rated. Subtitles. Directed by Hans Petter Moland. Starring Stellan Skarsgård
item.why: Norwegian dark comedies are great to see.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "A Somewhat Gentle Man"
